ISSUE.TITLE: Promote free NetBox Cloud option as alternative for evaluation
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Change Type Addition ### Area Installation/upgrade ### Proposed Changes Link to the free tier of [NetBox Cloud](https://netboxlabs.com/free-netbox-cloud/) as a quick way for users to get started with NetBox.
